text:
A benefit using task sequences to deploy machines re: recovery partition size. 
Snag_7b2929d.png [cid:a411c152-82ce-4f3b-8d9c-ee4707b2ed5c] 
Snag_7b6756d.png [cid:6589f334-fdfa-47c5-8530-4b887955d0d0] 
99% of 256gb - 253.44gb
99% of 512gb - 506.88gb
etc.. 
We're in the process of testing the patch (manually imported into MECM), so far
the pilot machines have installed the update successfully. I'm sure we'll have
some prehistoric machines fail, we'll remediate separately. Also taking the
opportunity to update the install media and boot media to include 2024-01 CU and
this patch moving forward (we tend to rollup install media every six months or
so).

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from jared.pool@outlook.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification]
